directions.step:
Preheat oven to 425. Season both sides of fish with salt & pepper. Place in lightly oiled dish. In bowl combine oregano with olive oil & bread crumbs. Spread crumb mixture evenly over surface of fish. Bake 6-12 minutes per inch of thickness, until fish is opaque throughout. Remove from oven & place under broiler for 1 minute to brown the crumb mixture.
